item.description:
Get some exercise while having great conversations! We'll then head on over to the British Beer Company for a great brunch and some live blues!

We're doing this with the Worcester Walkers Meetup Group! 

Meet at: Gloria Jeans Coffee, first floor by JC Penny. 

The Natick Collections is bright and airy and my favorite mall to walk in.

If you're not walking, feel free to still meet us for brunch and blues around 12:00 noon.

Please state in your RSVP comments box if you plan on just walking, just eating, or joining us for both.

 

The British Beer Company is located on Route 9 Eastbound across the street from the Natick Collections.  Address is:  120 Worcester Road, Framingham
item.how_to_find_us: Lower Level at Gloria Jeans Coffee by JC Penny.
item.why: Walking in the Natick Collections before the stores open is a lot of fun!
item.name: Walk, Brunch & Blues Joint Event with the Worcester Walkers
